description:
🔪 Ghostface returns for the ultimate kill. 🔪
In SCREAM 7 (2026), legacy survivors Courteney Cox and Neve Campbell face a terrifying new chapter as Woodsboro’s nightmare spreads beyond its borders. The rules have changed — and no one is safe.

Experience the suspense, blood-chilling twists, and brutal new Ghostface kills

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
